service { 'httpd':
    ensure  => 'running',
    enable  => true,
    hasrestart => true,
}
class sites {
        file {['/etc','/etc/httpd']:
          ensure => directory
        }
        file { '/etc/httpd/conf.d':
                ensure       => directory,
                group        => root,
                mode         => 0644,
                notify       => Service['httpd'],
                owner        => root,
                path         => '/etc/httpd/conf.d',
                purge        => true,
                recurse      => true,
                replace      => true,
                source       => 'puppet:///files/sites'
        }
}
node /^web([0-9]+)\.internal\.adire\.co\.uk$/ {
        include sites
}
# nfs-utils is used by EFS mount command
|| error_exit 'Failed to run cfn-init on CandC Server'
# All is well so signal success
